findSql.name: crmToSOMMigration.findAllOrbOrderHeaderToBeMigratedByOrderType
findSql.label: Find All ORB OrderHeader To Be Migrated By OrderType

method.name: cwOnFinderSQLSel
method.script: select {+*+} from orb_order_header where cwdocid in (select h.cwdocid from orb_order_header h, stcw_order_header s where h.order_number not like '%ErrGr%' and h.order_number not like '1-8543312_DELETE' -- strange case in PROD and s.order_status != 'REJECTED' and s.migrated = 0 and h.cwdocid = s.cwdocid {[0] and s.ordertype = ?})
